meanings.definition: To surpass in avoiding bad luck or misfortune.
meanings.sent1: She outjinxed all her friends by never spilling salt.
meanings.sent2: He always outjinxed his teammates by carrying a lucky charm.
meanings.sent3: The cat outjinxed the black cat by walking under a ladder without any accidents.
meanings.sent4: The rabbit outjinxed the fox by finding four-leaf clovers in a row.
meanings.sent5: The student outjinxed the teacher by always sitting in the same seat during exams.

meanings.definition: To outdo in avoiding a curse or spell.
meanings.sent1: The wizard outjinxed his rival by breaking the curse with a powerful spell.
meanings.sent2: She outjinxed the witch by wearing a protective amulet.
meanings.sent3: The potion outjinxed the curse, turning the frog back into a prince.
meanings.sent4: The talisman outjinxed the evil eye, protecting the village from harm.
meanings.sent5: The mirror outjinxed the spell, reflecting it back to its caster.
